description: [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) has used a Wi-Fi Pineapple to set up Evil Twin Wi-Fi Poisoning for the purposes of capturing victim credentials or planting espionage-oriented malware.(Citation: US District Court Indictment GRU Oct 2018)

external_references.description: Brady, S . (2018, October 3). Indictment - United States vs Aleksei Sergeyevich Morenets, et al.. Retrieved October 1, 2020.
external_references.source_name: US District Court Indictment GRU Oct 2018
